commit message: fixed unexpected scrolling after brightness adjustment
ZLViewWidget introduced; ZLView kwons about the application
refactoring: scrolling direction is now calculated inside an animation provider
refactoring: scrolling start position is only stored in an animation provider
disable starting of autoscrolling if autoscrolling is alreadi in progress
network data structure refactoring: url map is moved into NetworkItem
refactoring: Book reference is now a derived class of UrlInfo
refactoring: no separate map for book references; UrlCollection is used instead
refactoring: all the UrlInfo classes were moved to a separate directory
refactoring: INetworkLink constants replaced by UrlInfo.Type elements
refactoring UrlInfoWithDate is a subclass of UrlInfo
code simplification: standard Enum.toString method is used for UrlInfo keys
standard SSL certificates support has been implemented
back to recognize opf files as books
fixed return value of available() method
use next version of root OPDS catalog
better redirect support; a template for basic auth support
AuthenticationDialog will be replaced by AuthenticationActivity
own (not full, not persistent) cookie manager
cookies database cleanup: don't save obsolete cookies
